::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Greven::

Killfest nods, standing patiently while Astroblast flew off. 
EndBringer stands near him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise and Greven stop at the pool of Lava surrounding the Black 
Fortress. Greven activates his comm-link, sending a transmission to 
DrillBit:

"DrillBit, this is Greven. Killfest has left with our new allies to 
the Ark on a mission of great importance. He asked you to give us use 
of a shuttle and for as many bots to follow to the Ark as possible, 
carrying energon for the trip back."






--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: rAuq 
> 
> "Alright, we're off," replied Astroblast as he closed the hatch and 
> took off firing his perpendicular thrusters. "We will have to make 
a 
> quick stop at the base to pick up some energon." He leaves in the 
> direction of the Stunticon base.
